thread.title: Lajollacooks4u Marks 200 Amazing Reviews on TripAdvisor
thread.title_full: Lajollacooks4u Marks 200 Amazing Reviews on TripAdvisor

author: Jodi Abel
title: Lajollacooks4u Marks 200 Amazing Reviews on TripAdvisor
text:
This August, Lajollacooks4u celebrated its 200th excellent review on the world’s largest peer-review travel website, TripAdivsor . Jodi Abel, Founder and Chef of Lajollacooks4u, was humbled and overwhelmed with the abundance of warm reviews from her guests. “I am so proud of what we have created here,” said Chef Jodi. “Our 200 reviews are a testament to the wonderful brand that we have worked so hard to build; an achievement that solidifies everything we have been striving for and I am so grateful to our guests for helping us get there,” Chef Jodi said.
It is no surprise that Lajollacooks4u has managed to secure its place as one of the top travel destinations in San Diego. With Chef Jodi’s contagious personality, her mouthwatering recipes, and the breathtaking Californian scenery, Lajollacooks4u is definitely the place to be.
Guests that visit Lajollacooks4u share an experience unlike any other. After a memorable drive up scenic Mt. Soledad, visitors are greeted with beverages and a gourmet olive oil and salt tasting in Chef Jodi’s Tuscan garden, overlooking the Pacific Ocean. When the tasting is over, guests are ushered inside where their hands-on cooking class begins.
Each Lajollacooks4u class is customized to best suit the needs of the guests and their parties. From adapting dietary specifications for the evening’s menu, to incredible interactive team-building events , Lajollacooks4u always invests in its clients’ requests and needs.
Each event at Lajollacooks4u is unforgettable. Guests leave having learned new skills, techniques, and recipes to help them become amazing home chefs in their own kitchens. Not only do they walk away with culinary knowledge, but they also leave with treasured memories of friendship and bonding. There is something for everyone at Lajollacooks4u. Team-building groups form strong relationships with their colleagues, while small families and friends discover exciting new ways to stay connected. Lajollacooks4u is even a notable destination for couples looking for a romantic and creative alternative to dining out and celebrating special occasions.
Dave Medina, who visited August 17th with his wife, Veronica, recently commented on TripAdvisor with high praise for Jodi and Lajollacooks4u. “Who would of thought we could be involved in creating a truly world class meal in the comfort of Jodi’s Italian villa,” said Medina. “My wife and I can’t wait to recreate this fantastic dinner for our friends, and thanks to Jodi, we know how.“
About Lajollacooks4u:
Lajollacooks4u, founded in 2008, provides an ideal activity for corporate team building, couples and any foodie looking for a unique cooking and culinary experience in a magnificent setting overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Based in La Jolla, a suburb of San Diego, CA, Lajollacooks4u has enjoyed record growth since its inception and has been ranked the number one attraction in La Jolla on the popular travel review site, Trip Advisor. For more information, contact Jodi Abel at jodi(at)lajollacooks4u(dot)com or phone 1-858-752-4980
Lajollacooks4u customizes all events to meet the desires and needs of the organization. For reservations, contact Jodi Abel, or visit Lajollacooks4u’s website at http://www.lajollacooks4u.com
